articles.author: Brendan Cole
articles.title: Angry Mob in Ukraine Throws Stones at Buses Carrying Evacuees from Coronavirus Epicenter
articles.description: Buses under police escort took more than 70 people evacuated from China to a hospital in the central Poltava region. Authorities said none of them are sick.
articles.content:
Protesters in Ukraine attacked a convoy of buses carrying dozens of people evacuated from the Chinese city of Wuhan, amid fears over the spread of coronavirus.

articles.title: China Changed How It Defines 'Confirmed' Coronavirus Cases—Here's Why That's a Problem
articles.description: If they don't stick to one definition of what constitutes a case, officials may not be able to accurately assess the situation.

articles.title: YouTube Bans Anti-Semitic Channel TruNews After Founder Calls Trump Impeachment 'Jew Coup'
articles.description: YouTube permanently banned anti-Semitic conspiracy news outlet TruNews Thursday, months after the organization deemed the impeachment of President Donald Trump a "Jew coup."
articles.content:
Anti-Semitic conspiracy news outlet TruNews was permanently banned from YouTube Thursday, after repeatedly violating the website's rules regarding hate speech.
